role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that automates the process of adding VPN profiles to the system's built-in VPN client
role_description_full_overview: You can populate a configuration to power this role. When configured properly, the system's built-in VPN client will be configured with your desired settings.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that automates the process of adding VPN profiles to the system's built-in VPN client.
